subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Attackman Zack Greer scored with three seconds remaining to bail out Duke after it squandered a 10-3 third-quarter lead in the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse semifinals.
snippet: Attackman Zack Greer scored with three seconds remaining to bail out Duke after it squandered a 10-3 third-quarter lead in the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse semifinals.
